theme.name: Marketing Intelligence Hub
theme.description: Tema futurista e profissional para aplicações de marketing digital
theme.author: Marketing AI

fonts.system: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, sans-serif

keyframes.pulse: @keyframes pulse { 0%, 100% { opacity: 1; transform: scaleX(1); } 50% { opacity: 0.5; transform: scaleX(0.95); } }
keyframes.slideUp: @keyframes slideUp { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(50px) scale(0.9); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0) scale(1); } }

primary.base: bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-600 to-emerald-500 text-black font-bold px-8 py-4 border-none cursor-pointer text-base relative overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 clip-path-button
primary.before: absolute top-0 -left-full w-full h-full bg-gradient-to-r from-transparent via-white/30 to-transparent transition-all duration-500

secondary.base: bg-transparent text-emerald-400 border-2 border-emerald-400 px-8 py-4 cursor-pointer text-base transition-all duration-300 clip-path-button

card.base: bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-800/50 to-slate-700/50 border border-slate-600 p-8 relative overflow-hidden transition-all duration-300 clip-path-card

badge.primary: bg-emerald-500 text-black text-xs font-bold px-3 py-1 rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider
badge.secondary: bg-purple-500 text-black text-xs font-bold px-3 py-1 rounded-none uppercase tracking-wider

input.base: bg-black/50 border-2 border-slate-600 text-white px-4 py-3 focus:border-emerald-400 focus:outline-none transition-colors duration-300

modal.overlay: fixed inset-0 bg-black/95 backdrop-blur-xl z-50 flex items-center justify-center opacity-0 pointer-events-none transition-opacity duration-300
modal.container: bg-gradient-to-br from-black/90 to-slate-900/90 border-2 border-emerald-500 max-w-4xl max-h-90vh overflow-y-auto p-12 relative clip-path-modal
modal.close: absolute top-6 right-6 bg-transparent border-2 border-emerald-400 text-emerald-400 w-12 h-12 cursor-pointer transition-all duration-300 font-bold text-xl

navigation.sidenav: fixed left-0 top-0 h-screen w-20 bg-black/90 backdrop-blur-xl border-r border-emerald-500/30 z-50 transition-all duration-300
navigation.dot: w-3 h-3 rounded-full border-2 border-emerald-400 bg-transparent cursor-pointer transition-all duration-400 cubic-bezier-nav
navigation.tooltip: absolute left-8 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 bg-emerald-400 text-black px-3 py-1.5 rounded text-sm font-semibold whitespace-nowrap opacity-0 pointer-events-none transition-opacity duration-300

gradient.text: bg-gradient-to-r from-emerald-400 via-blue-500 to-purple-600 bg-clip-text text-transparent
gradient.hero: radial-gradient(ellipse at top right, rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.15) 0%, transparent 50%), radial-gradient(ellipse at bottom left, rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1) 0%, transparent 50%), #000
